source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 517,798 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 248,111.
Set: Verdant Embrace always grants Insurance! to you and your target for 6 sec and its cooldown is reduced by 4.0 sec.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,546 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 198 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,957 to 9,725 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 295 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: G3T-00t
description: Complete with shock and bludgeoning capabilities.
